channel.title: Run Server Error
channel.description: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "0F" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:2213) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:32) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:60) Saving players... Press any key to continue . . .[/code] This makes no sense considering I had a backup of the source and i ran that it worked perfectly so I replaced NPChandler in the error'd source with the good npchandler and it still doesnt work wtf?

item.title: Run Server Error
item.dc:creator: @jamie233 jamie233
item.description:
@jamie233 wrote:

Press any key to continue . . .
This makes no sense considering I had a backup of the source and i ran that it worked perfectly so I replaced NPChandler in the errorâ€™d source with the good npchandler and it still doesnt work wtf?
